description: Create a speech recognition engine instance.
Synchronously open a file and return a file handle for subsequent I/O.
Synchronously read file data into a buffer.
Synchronously get file or directory metadata (for example size and timestamps).
Navigate to a specified page by URL.
Navigate back by popping the top page from the stack.
Launch the system camera/media picker and return the selected or captured media result.
Create an audio capturer instance (for recording or audio capture).
Create an audio renderer instance (for audio playback).
Start device vibration with the specified effect or parameters.
